RecipeDef.label: compress hay
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech kibble by compressing hay. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

RecipeDef.label: make archotech spices
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech spices by mixing and compressing different condiments. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

RecipeDef.label: compress plant matter in bulk
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech plant matter by compressing vegetables or fruits. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

RecipeDef.label: compress meat in bulk
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech meat by compressing meat. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

RecipeDef.label: compress animal products in bulk
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech animal product by compressing different animal products. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

RecipeDef.label: compress hay in bulk
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech kibble by compressing hay. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".

ThingDef.label: archotech spices
ThingDef.description: A vial containing a strange liquid. It can change its own flavour and consistency to improve the flavour of any dish.

HediffDef.label: consumed archotech spices (from meal)
HediffDef.description: Consuming archotech spices has given this pawn a small boost.

ThingDef.label: vanometric liquid processor
ThingDef.description: A vanometric liquid processor. It appears to be slightly altering time during cooking, greatly speeding up the process. It requires no power or fuel to function.

ThingDef.label: vanometric time alteration chamber
ThingDef.description: An archotech device with a chamber containing what appears to be a time-altering anomaly. Using it for the purpose of aging cheese and alcohol was an obvious and logical step.

ThingDef.label: archotech stove
ThingDef.description: A stove equipped with the tools necessary for archotech-level cooking, said tools seem to be appearing and disappearing out of existence seemingly at random. Normal cooking and butchering recipes can still be performed, with a boost to speed and efficiency. Cooking at it seems to yield more meals that usual, it's impossible to tell where they are coming from though. It requires no power or fuel to function.

ThingDef.label: archotech cheese
ThingDef.description: A strange block of cheese created by an archotech device. When eaten it changes its form to match the texture and taste of the consumer's favourite type of cheese. It also glows for some reason.

HediffDef.label: consumed archotech cheese (from meal)
HediffDef.description: Consuming archotech cheese has given this pawn a defense boost.

ThingDef.label: uncooked archotech soup
ThingDef.description: An uncooked archotech soup. This needs to be cooked in a vanometric pot to be edible.

ThingDef.label: archotech soup
ThingDef.description: A special meal prepared with archotech ingredients. Delicious and healthy.

ThingDef.label: archotech grill
ThingDef.description: A special meal prepared with archotech ingredients. Delicious and healthy. Itâ€™s so filling that consuming it almost removes any need to eat for a few days.

HediffDef.label: Archotech Grill Boost
HediffDef.labelNoun: This pawn won't need to eat for a while.
HediffDef.description: After eating an archotech grill this pawn won't need to eat for a few days.

ThingDef.label: archotech bake
ThingDef.description: A special meal prepared with archotech ingredients. Delicious and healthy.

ThingDef.label: archotech dessert
ThingDef.description: A strange dessert from archotech ingredients. Its flavour has been said to be "orgasm-inducing".

li.label: ate archotech dessert
li.description: Tasty, yummy, delicious, mouth-watering, flavourful, succulent, sweet, rich, savoury, delightful, exquisite, lovely, delectable, heavenly, glorious, divine ... I need more!

RecipeDef.label: make archotech soda syrup
RecipeDef.description: Make archotech syrup by mixing archotech plant matter with architech spices.

ThingDef.label: archotech soda syrup
ThingDef.description: A strange glowing liquid, circuit-like bubbles seem to form near the surface. It appears to be undergoing some kind of chemical reaction, which will most likely take a while, unless you are in possesion of some time-manipulating devices.

ThingDef.label: archotech soda
ThingDef.description: A very sweet beverage created by an archotech device. It has the ability to change its flavor and coloring to match the consumer's preference. Provides an ureasonably strong sugar rush, removing the consumer's need to sleep for up to 2 days.

HediffDef.label: drank archotech soda
HediffDef.description: A burst of a strange sugar-like substance enters the bloodstream, providing so much energy that sleep isn't needed for a while. The buff lasts for up to 2 days.

mods.li: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

li.label: ate archotech dessert (craved)
li.description: Tasty, yummy, delicious, mouth-watering, flavourful, succulent, sweet, rich, savoury, delightful, exquisite, lovely, delectable, heavenly, glorious, divine ... I need more!
